prompt:
What are some examples of how artificial intelligence can be used in modern education?
Artificial intelligence has been integrated into modern education to create personalized learning experiences that cater to each student's unique needs. For example, AI systems can analyze a student's performance and suggest topics or resources that would best help them improve their understanding of the subject matter. Additionally, AI can be used to develop adaptive assessment tools that evaluate students' progress in real time and provide immediate feedback on areas where improvement is needed.
